front.title: •Despair (V)
front.gametext: Deploy on table. My Favorite Decoration may not be placed out of play. At same site as Jabba's Prize, opponent's characters deploy +1 and your Force drains are +1. While Jabba's Prize with Scum And Villainy, your total power in all battles is +3. (Immune to Alter.)
front.lore: The carbonite froze more than just Han's body.
